Package jakarta.nosql.document

Interface DocumentQuery.DocumentWhere

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DocumentQuery.DocumentQueryBuild
    Enclosing interface:
    DocumentQuery
    public static interface DocumentQuery.DocumentWhere
extends DocumentQuery.DocumentQueryBuild
    The Document Where whose define the condition in the query.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DocumentQuery.DocumentNameCondition and​(String name)
      Starts a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.and(DocumentCondition)
      DocumentQuery.DocumentLimit limit​(long limit)
      Defines the maximum number of results to retrieve.
      DocumentQuery.DocumentNameCondition or​(String name)
      Appends a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.or(DocumentCondition)
      DocumentQuery.DocumentOrder orderBy​(String name)
      Add the order how the result will returned
      DocumentQuery.DocumentSkip skip​(long skip)
      Defines the position of the first result to retrieve.

      • Methods inherited from interface jakarta.nosql.document.DocumentQuery.DocumentQueryBuild

        build, getResult, getSingleResult

    • Method Detail

      • and

        DocumentQuery.DocumentNameCondition and​(String name)
        Starts a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.and(DocumentCondition)
        Parameters:
        name - a condition to be added
        Returns:
        the same DocumentQuery.DocumentNameCondition with the condition appended
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when condition is null

      • or

        DocumentQuery.DocumentNameCondition or​(String name)
        Appends a new condition in the select using DocumentCondition.or(DocumentCondition)
        Parameters:
        name - a condition to be added
        Returns:
        the same DocumentQuery.DocumentNameCondition with the condition appended
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when condition is null

      • skip

        DocumentQuery.DocumentSkip skip​(long skip)
        Defines the position of the first result to retrieve. It will depend on the NoSQL vendor implementation, but it will discard or skip the search result.
        Parameters:
        skip - the first result to retrieve
        Returns:
        a query with first result defined
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if skip is negative

      • limit

        DocumentQuery.DocumentLimit limit​(long limit)
        Defines the maximum number of results to retrieve. It will truncate to be no longer than limit.
        Parameters:
        limit - the limit
        Returns:
        a query with the limit defined
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if limit is negative

      • orderBy

        DocumentQuery.DocumentOrder orderBy​(String name)
        Add the order how the result will returned
        Parameters:
        name - the order
        Returns:
        a query with the sort defined
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when name is null
